name: Deep Work (According to Calendar Blocks)
description: Peak 'should be focusing' time. The banter acknowledges that blocking out focus time and actually focusing are two different things. This is the show for people with 'Do Not Disturb' on who are still somehow in three conversations.

presenters.notes: Mix of duo and solo, minimal interruptions, respect the focus time

tone.mood: Aspirationally focused, realistically aware that deep work is mostly a myth

check_ins: For everyone with 'busy' on their calendar
sample_lines: That was 'Focus Mode' requested by Claire. Claire, we hope your calendar block is holding.
Coming up: three tracks in a row. No guarantees your Slack will respect that.
Deep work hours, according to the productivity books you bought but haven't read.
For everyone with 'busy' on their calendar who's currently looking at memes: we see you.

handover.style: Quick, efficient handover respecting the focus vibe

winter.tone_adjustment: Reference shorter days affecting energy, darker mornings to midday

summer.tone_adjustment: Reference nice weather outside, temptation to not work

christmas_period.tone_adjustment: Acknowledge reduced work, people taking time off
christmas_period.notes: Keep it minimal, some people still working

ai_budget.notes: 40% talk = 72 minutes = 4320 seconds of TTS maximum, 60% music = 108 minutes
